    • drawChart

      public void drawChart()
      Draw chart of norm values and searched values Draws only parameters that the user checked in check boxes

    • handleParams

      public Stats handleParams​(java.lang.String param)
      Handle checked parameters: create AirQ object and Stats object to get response If there is no response show alert dialog If there is a response display average value of parameter in text flow
      Parameters:
      param - parameter got from check box
      Returns:
      Stats object for further analyzing

    • handleStats

      public void handleStats​(Stats stats)
      Display statistics of chosen param in the combo box
      Parameters:
      stats - Stats object od parameter

    • handleAqiIndicator

      public void handleAqiIndicator​(java.lang.String aqiLvl)
      Move indicator on color line to accurate position on window Changes the x position of indicator The position is based on aqi level
      Parameters:
      aqiLvl - AQI level calculated before

    • handleCheckBoxes

      public java.util.List<java.lang.String> handleCheckBoxes​(javafx.scene.control.CheckBox... boxes)
      Get selected check boxes on list
      Parameters:
      boxes - check boxes of parameters
      Returns:
      list of names of selected check boxes
